issue.title: [Packaging][Ubuntu] Drop support for 16.04
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11910](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11910). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/EOL#Ubuntu_16.04_Xenial_Xerus

2021-04 is the EOL of Ubuntu 16.04.
